thread.title: Beautiful hotel and wonderful service!
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel and wonderful service! - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stephanie L
title: Beautiful hotel and wonderful service!
text:
Our family of four (including two teen boys) stayed here for five nights for Spring Break. We had a double queen room on the 15th floor.
The hotel is beautiful. The rooms are a good size, for Manhattan. Very tastefully decorated and with everything we needed for a great stay.
I can't say enough about the friendly and super fast customer service at this hotel. Every staff member we came in contact with was wonderful. Requests for extra items were delivered super fast!
The street is away from the "hub bub" of Times Square, but the subway lines on 28th street make everything close by. The street is quiet with the beautiful sites of the flower district.
I highly recommend this hotel and will definitely stay there again!
